Plot: Eight years after the disappearance of Cassandra, some disturbing incidents seem to indicate that she's still alive. Police, parents and Cassandra herself, will try to unravel the mystery of her disappearance.
Title: The Captive
Writer: Atom Egoyan (screenplay), David Fraser (screenplay), Atom Egoyan (story)
Actors: Kevin Durand, Alexia Fast, Mireille Enos, Rosario Dawson
tomatoConsensus: Wan and lugubrious, The Captive represents another atmospheric, beautifully filmed misfire from director Atom Egoyan.
